name: The Universim
description: Jump straight into managing your own planets as you guide a civilization through the ages. Become the ultimate empire in The Universim, a new breed of God Game in development by Crytivo.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bit or Higher Processor: 2.6 Ghz  - 4 Cores Mid Range CPU or Higher Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 780 | RX 290 or Higher Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Duh!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bit or Higher Processor: 3.0 Ghz - 8 Cores or Higher Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti | RX390 or Higher Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Duh!
